docs.snippet: Conflicting price trends characterized yesterday's slightly more active trading in bonds on the New York Stock Exchange. High-grade investments, under the leadership of United States Government loans, were firm to moderately higher, while mixed price...
docs.lead_paragraph: Conflicting price trends characterized yesterday's slightly more active trading in bonds on the New York Stock Exchange. High-grade investments, under the leadership of United States Government loans, were firm to moderately higher, while mixed price movements ruled in selective trading among most of the secondary domestic corporation bonds.

headline.main: HIGH-GRADE BONDS FIRM TO STRONGER; United States Treasury Loans Lead in Upward Movement -- Secondary Issues Mixed. READING WEAK IN RAIL LIST Italian Dollar Liens Down 2 1/2 to 5 1/2 Points on Fresh Wave of Selling.

docs.snippet: BERLIN, Aug. 8. -- America's defeat by the Netherlands in water polo today by 3 to 2 means almost certainly its elimination in the first round of the Olympic meet, in which sixteen nations are entered.
docs.lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Aug. 8. -- America's defeat by the Netherlands in water polo today by 3 to 2 means almost certainly its elimination in the first round of the Olympic meet, in which sixteen nations are entered.

headline.main: U.S. TEAM BEATEN IN WATER POLO, 3-2; Set Back by the Netherlands Despite Its Furious Rally in Second Period. O'CONNOR SCORES A GOAL Beck Also Counts for Losers -- Americans Face Elimination From Olympic Meet.

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Glenn Morris set world record of 7,900 points as Americans swept first three places in decathlon; Bob Clark was second and Jack Parker third.
docs.lead_paragraph: Glenn Morris set world record of 7,900 points as Americans swept first three places in decathlon; Bob Clark was second and Jack Parker third.

headline.main: URUGUAY FIVE TRIUMPHS; China and Egypt Also Are Victors in Consolation Games.

docs.snippet: Except for the English pound and the Scandinavians, all other European exchanges were lower last week. Heaviness in the French franc was ascribed to the acute financial conditions in France, while the civil war in Spain contributed to the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Except for the English pound and the Scandinavians, all other European exchanges were lower last week. Heaviness in the French franc was ascribed to the acute financial conditions in France, while the civil war in Spain contributed to the unsettlement of the peseta and other units.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED AUG. 8, 1936
America Beats Uruguay At Water Polo, 2 to 1

docs.snippet: BERLIN, Aug. 9 (AP). -- The United States opened its drive for the Olympic basketball championship today by crushing Estonia, 52 to 28, in a second-round match. The Americans had drawn a bye in the first round.
docs.lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Aug. 9 (AP). -- The United States opened its drive for the Olympic basketball championship today by crushing Estonia, 52 to 28, in a second-round match. The Americans had drawn a bye in the first round.

headline.main: AMERICAN QUINTET CRUSHES ESTONIA; United States Scores Almost at Will in Olympic Second Round Victory, 52-28. LUBIN MAKES 13 POINTS Philippines, Canada, Uruguay, Peru, Chile, Italy, Japan and Switzerland Also Win.

docs.snippet: Kitei Son, Japanese youngster, won the classic marathon title in the new Olympic record time of 2 hours 29 minutes 19.2 seconds as the track and field competition closed. Johnny Kelley was the only American to finish. Ellison Brown and Bill McMahon...
docs.lead_paragraph: Kitei Son, Japanese youngster, won the classic marathon title in the new Olympic record time of 2 hours 29 minutes 19.2 seconds as the track and field competition closed. Johnny Kelley was the only American to finish. Ellison Brown and Bill McMahon dropped out.
